snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 4,469 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war and 1,783 who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 4,469 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war and 1,783 who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.

headline.seo: U.S. Military Deaths in Iraq and Afghanistan
